fields.title: DDD In Practice: From Ubiquitous Language DSL to Complete Spring-Boot Kotlin Project

frontmatter.title: DDD In Practice: From Ubiquitous Language DSL to Complete Spring-Boot Kotlin Project
frontmatter.author: Ivan Garcia Sainz-Aja
frontmatter.excerpt: In this article, we will explore how to use ZenWave360 to generate a complete SpringBoot Kotlin project from a Ubiquitous Language DSL model.
